onboarding_step0_body: Unustasis is a third party app for the unu Scooter Pro. Connect your scooter to get started.
onboarding_step1_body: Make sure your scooter is turned on and in range. Once you're ready, press the button below to start.
onboarding_step2_body: This may take a few seconds. If your phone asks you to pair, please accept and enter the code on your scooter's display.
onboarding_step3_body: If your phone asks you to pair, please accept and enter the code on your scooter's display. Press the button below to finish onboarding.
